items.title: Trump says he plans to hold talks on Ukraine in coming days
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he plans to hold talks about the war in Ukraine in coming days after his Alaska summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin in August failed to achieve a breakthrough. Read full story

items.title: Epstein victims urge US Congress to pass bill requiring release of documents

items.title: Pornhub will only have to pay $5 million to settle CSAM, exploitation allegations

items.title: Bolsonaro rights to defense in Brazil coup trial were restricted, lawyer says
items.summary: BRASILIA (Reuters) -Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro, who is on trial for charges of plotting a coup after he lost the 2022 election, did not attack democracy and has had his right to a fair defense restricted, his lawyer argued on Wednesday. Read full story

items.title: Steep drop takes LISEN’s clamp-on MagSafe gooseneck mount all the way down to $12.50 (Reg. $22)
items.summary:
LISEN MagSafe Gooseneck iPhone Mount

Buy for $12.50 (Reg. $22)

Apply code 9WI2Y6DP during checkout

What we love

The popularity of MagSafe has really paved the way for all sorts of creative mounts to exist. This is certainly one of them, with a gooseneck design that can be twisted and turned all sorts of ways to dial in the perfect viewing angle. A clamp-on style allows it to be attached to all sorts of surfaces ranging from desks to coffee tables, nightstands, and more.

items.title: Here’s how to get a deal on Hollow Knight Silksong before it releases tomorrow morning
items.summary:
We’re only a few hours away from the launch of Hollow Knight: Silksong, which is arriving tomorrow at a surprisingly low $19.99 in the U.S. Just in time for release day, Newegg is running a deal on a $100 Xbox gift card, dropping it to $88 via email delivery. Simply enter promo code SSEWA63 at checkout to secure the discount. Newegg dishes out these discounted gift cards quite frequently, but this one lines up perfectly for picking up Silksong or even stacking up on Game Pass Ultimate ahead of the big launch. The game, in case you’re wondering, is coming to the Xbox Game Pass tomorrow.

This new device is still fresh onto the scene, having only been on the market since June and normally going for $200 at full price. The discounts in the time since have seen two previous falls to this same rate, while keeping higher at $177, $160, or more the rest of the time – with a single drop to the $140 low we only saw during July’s Prime Day event. You’re looking at the third-ever chance to pick up this two-pack at the second-best price we have tracked.
